actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that recipients of the Purple Heart award be considered compensably disabled veterans for purpose of veterans' preference in Federal civil service.

summary.text: Amends Federal veterans' benefits provisions to provide that recipients of the Purple Heart award be considered compensably disabled veterans for purposes of the veterans' preference in Federal civil service employment.

titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that recipients of the Purple Heart award be considered compensably disabled veterans for purpose of veterans' preference in Federal civil service.
